name: Cinnabon Rolls
ingredients: 2 Tbsp dry yeast ½ c. margarine
3 ½ oz. pkg vanilla pudding mix 3 c. powdered sugar
steps: ½ c. warm water 8 oz. cream cheese
½ c. margarine melted 1 Tbsp. milk
To make frosting, mix all ingredients until smooth. Stir until dissolved. Set aside. In large bowl, take pudding mix
and prepare according to the package directions. Add margarine, eggs and salt. Mix well. Then add yeast
mixture. Blend. Gradually add flour; knead until smooth. Place in a greased bowl. Cover and let rise until doubled.
Punch down dough and let rise again. Then roll out on floured board to 34 x 21" size. Take 1 cup soft butter and
spread over surface. In bowl, mix 2 c. brown sugar and 4 tsp. cinnamon. Sprinkle over the top. Roll up very tightly.
hand and lightly press down on each roll. Cover and let rise again until double. Bake at 350 for 15-­‐20 min.
